summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs of the Dallas City Council will convene on March 7, 2024, at 11:00 AM in the Council Briefing Room at Dallas City Hall. The meeting aims to discuss key administrative matters, particularly related to the recruitment of a new City Manager.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the previous meeting on February 26, 2024.
2. Discussion on City Council feedback regarding a survey related to the City Manager recruitment process.
3. Review of a template for an employee survey concerning the City Manager recruitment.
4. Establishing a timeline for the Request for Proposals (RFP) for a City Manager recruitment consultant.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include discussions on the feedback received from a survey aimed at gathering insights from the City Council about the City Manager recruitment process. Additionally, a template for an employee survey will be presented to ensure comprehensive input from city staff. The timeline for the RFP will be crucial for timely recruitment.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and will discuss and potentially approve the survey template and timeline for the recruitment consultant RFP. The meeting may also enter an executive session to discuss sensitive matters related to the recruitment process or other legal considerations.
